00023 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00024 // Function: AssistedTextEdit()
00025 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 AssistedTextEdit::AssistedTextEdit(QSharedPointer<ITextContentMatcher> contentMatcher,
00027                                    QWidget* mainWnd, QWidget* parent) : QPlainTextEdit(parent),
00028                                                                         contentAssist_(),
00029                                                                         indentStyle_(INDENT_STYLE_TAB),
00030                                                                         indentWidth_(DEFAULT_INDENT_WIDTH)
00031 {
00032     setFont(QFont("Courier", 10));
00033     setLineWrapMode(NoWrap);
00034 
00035     contentAssist_ = QSharedPointer<TextContentAssistWidget>(new TextContentAssistWidget(this, contentMatcher));
00036 
00037     // Install this as an event filter so that we can track events from the main window.
00038     mainWnd->installEventFilter(this);
00039 }

00048 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 // Function: setIndentStyle()
00050 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 void AssistedTextEdit::setIndentStyle(IndentStyle style, unsigned int width)
00052 {
00053     indentStyle_ = style;
00054     indentWidth_ = width;
00055 
00056     // Set the correct tab stop width.
00057     QFontMetrics metrics(font());
00058     setTabStopWidth(indentWidth_ * metrics.averageCharWidth());
00059 }

00067 }

00077 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 // Function: eventFilter()
00079 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 bool AssistedTextEdit::eventFilter(QObject*, QEvent* e)
00081 {
00082     // Cancel the assist if the main window is moved or resized.
00083     if (contentAssist_->isContentShown() && (e->type() == QEvent::Move || e->type() == QEvent::Resize))
00084     {
00085         contentAssist_->cancel();
00086     }
00087 
00088     return false;
00089 }
00090 
00091 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 // Function: keyPressEvent()
00093 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 void AssistedTextEdit::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* e)
00095 {
00096     // First try to handle the key full by the content assist.
00097     if (!contentAssist_->tryHandleKey(e))
00098     {
00099         // Process the key event if it still needs handling by the editor.
00100         switch (e->key())
00101         {
00102         case Qt::Key_Tab:
00103             {
00104                 // Check if the tab indentation needs to be replaced with spaces.
00105                 if (indentStyle_ == INDENT_STYLE_SPACES)
00106                 {
00107                     // Invoke a custom key press event for indentation.
00108                     QKeyEvent indentEvent(QEvent::KeyPress, 0, Qt::NoModifier, createIndentString(1),
00109                                           indentWidth_);
00110                     QPlainTextEdit::keyPressEvent(&indentEvent);
00111                 }
00112                 break;
00113             }
00114 
00115         case Qt::Key_Return:
00116             {
00117                 onReturnKeyPress(e);
00118                 break;
00119             }
00120 
00121         case Qt::Key_BraceRight:
00122             {
00123                 // Handle the key event.
00124                 QPlainTextEdit::keyPressEvent(e);
00125 
00126                 // Indent the right brace.
00127                 indentRightBrace();
00128                 break;
00129             }
00130 
00131         case Qt::Key_Colon:
00132             {
00133                 // Handle the key event.
00134                 QPlainTextEdit::keyPressEvent(e);
00135 
00136                 // Indent the colon correctly.
00137                 indentColon();
00138                 break;
00139             }
00140 
00141         default:
00142             {
00143                 // Default operation.
00144                 QPlainTextEdit::keyPressEvent(e);
00145                 break;
00146             }
00147         }
00148 
00149         // Update the content assist.
00150         contentAssist_->updateAssist(e);
00151     }
00152 }

00164         contentAssist_->cancel();
00165     }

00182 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00183 // Function: createIndentString()
00184 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00185 QString AssistedTextEdit::createIndentString(unsigned int depth)
00186 {
00187     switch (indentStyle_)
00188     {
00189     case INDENT_STYLE_TAB:
00190         {
00191             return QString(depth, '\t');
00192         }
00193 
00194     case INDENT_STYLE_SPACES:
00195         {
00196             return QString(depth * indentWidth_, ' ');
00197         }
00198     }
00199 
00200     // Shouldn't ever get here.
00201     assert(false);
00202     return QString();
00203 }
00204 
00205 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00206 // Function: calculateIndentDepth()
00207 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00208 int AssistedTextEdit::calculateIndentDepth(int pos)
00209 {
00210     int indentDepth = 0;
00211     int searchPos = 0;
00212     int discardPos = 0;
00213     QString text = toPlainText();
00214     QRegExp braceExp("(\\{|\\})");
00215     QRegExp discardExp("(\"([^\"]|(\\\\\"))*\")|(\'([^\']|(\\\\\'))*\')|(//[^\n]*\\n)|(/\\*[^*/]*\\*/)");
00216 
00217     // Search all braces up to the cursor position discarding comments, strings and char literals.
00218     searchPos = braceExp.indexIn(text);
00219     discardPos = discardExp.indexIn(text);
00220 
00221     while (searchPos >= 0 && searchPos < pos)
00222     {
00223         // If the search position has gone over the discard area, search the next discard area.
00224         while (discardPos >= 0 && searchPos >= discardPos + discardExp.matchedLength())
00225         {
00226             discardPos = discardExp.indexIn(text, discardPos + discardExp.matchedLength());
00227         }
00228 
00229         if (discardPos < 0 || searchPos < discardPos || searchPos > discardPos + discardExp.matchedLength())
00230         {
00231             QChar c = text.at(searchPos);
00232 
00233             if (c == '{')
00234             {
00235                 ++indentDepth;
00236             }
00237             else if (c == '}')
00238             {
00239                 --indentDepth;
00240             }
00241         }
00242 
00243         searchPos = braceExp.indexIn(text, searchPos + 1);
00244     }
00245 
00246     return std::max(indentDepth, 0);
00247 }
00248 
00249 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00250 // Function: indentRightBrace()
00251 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00252 void AssistedTextEdit::indentRightBrace()
00253 {
00254     static QRegExp braceRightExp("^\\s*(?=\\})");
00255     QString blockStr = textCursor().block().text();
00256 
00257     // Update the beginning of the current text block with the correct indentation
00258     // if there is only whitespace before the first right brace.
00259     int startIndex = braceRightExp.indexIn(blockStr);
00260 
00261     if (startIndex >= 0)
00262     {
00263         // Calculate the indentation depth.
00264         int indentDepth = calculateIndentDepth(textCursor().block().position() +
00265                                                braceRightExp.matchedLength() + 1);
00266         int startIndex = textCursor().block().position();
00267         int endIndex = startIndex + braceRightExp.matchedLength();
00268 
00269         // Replace the area with the correct indentation.
00270         replaceWithIndent(startIndex, endIndex, indentDepth);
00271     }
00272 }
00273 
00274 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00275 // Function: indentColon()
00276 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00277 void AssistedTextEdit::indentColon()
00278 {
00279     static QRegExp wpStartExp("^\\s*(?=[^;]*:)");
00280     QString blockStr = textCursor().block().text();
00281 
00282     // Update the beginning of the current text block with the correct indentation
00283     // for the whitespace part, if there is no following semicolon.
00284     int startIndex = wpStartExp.indexIn(blockStr);
00285 
00286     if (startIndex >= 0)
00287     {
00288         // Calculate the indentation depth.
00289         int indentDepth = std::max(0, calculateIndentDepth(textCursor().block().position() +
00290                                                            wpStartExp.matchedLength()) - 1);
00291 
00292         int startIndex = textCursor().block().position();
00293         int endIndex = startIndex + wpStartExp.matchedLength();
00294 
00295         // Replace the area with the correct indentation.
00296         replaceWithIndent(startIndex, endIndex, indentDepth);
00297     }
00298 }
00299 
00300 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00301 // Function: replaceWithIndent()
00302 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00303 void AssistedTextEdit::replaceWithIndent(int startIndex, int endIndex, int indentDepth)
00304 {
00305     // Save the old cursor.
00306     QTextCursor oldCursor = textCursor();
00307 
00308     // Select the part of the block to auto-indent.
00309     QTextCursor cursor = oldCursor;
00310     cursor.setPosition(startIndex, QTextCursor::MoveAnchor);
00311     cursor.setPosition(endIndex, QTextCursor::KeepAnchor);
00312     setTextCursor(cursor);
00313 
00314     // And then replace it with the correct indentation.
00315     if (indentDepth > 0)
00316     {
00317         QKeyEvent indentEvent(QEvent::KeyPress, 0, Qt::NoModifier, createIndentString(indentDepth),
00318                               indentDepth);
00319         QPlainTextEdit::keyPressEvent(&indentEvent);
00320     }
00321     else
00322     {
00323         textCursor().removeSelectedText();
00324     }
00325 
00326     // Restore the cursor.
00327     setTextCursor(oldCursor);
00328 }
00329 
00330 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00331 // Function: onReturnKeyPress()
00332 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00333 void AssistedTextEdit::onReturnKeyPress(QKeyEvent* e)
00334 {
00335     // Calculate the indentation depth.
00336     int indentDepth = calculateIndentDepth(textCursor().position());
00337 
00338     // Handle the enter event.
00339     QPlainTextEdit::keyPressEvent(e);
00340 
00341     // Apply auto-indentation.
00342     if (indentDepth > 0)
00343     {
00344         QKeyEvent indentEvent(QEvent::KeyPress, 0, Qt::NoModifier, createIndentString(indentDepth),
00345                               indentDepth);
00346         QPlainTextEdit::keyPressEvent(&indentEvent);
00347     }
00348 }
